column4: does anyone know how to configure hardware to change what video output you use in 9.04?
there are a few guis to try, then theres always the terminal if those doesnt work. Search google for: xorg configure gui or something
the only thing that google turned up was xorg-edit which doesn't work for 64-bit
There are many, both CLI and GUI. Youll find a way. Ill re later
